title: poster typeface
content:
what is the typeface used for the main lettering on this flyer? thanks!

X

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/6a00d8341ca70953ef0120a54306fc970b-800wi_3738.jpg)
author: waterytart

comments.content:
Might be Futura Bold, it’s hard to tell from the pic if the **C** s are a match.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FUTBOLD_3733.gif)

This was a tricky one, but I’ll have to go with [Graphicus DT Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024143/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/graphicus-dt/). The light condensed subhead type below matches the same family and confirms the match.
Actually, the angles on the terminals of the C’s and the slightly different weight of them, tells me the C’s are Avenir with the rest in Futura Bold.

_the C’s are Avenir with the rest in Futura Bold_

Who would do something like that? Rather unlikely.  
I think William is right.
